Ingrediants Required -
 • Ladies finger - ½ kg
 • Green chillies - 3
 • Red chilly powder - 1 ½ teaspoons
 • Salt - as required
 • Dhania powder - 2 teaspoons
 • Jeera powder - ½ teaspoon
 • Sugar - 1 teaspoon
 • Tomato - 1
 • Curd (fresh, thick) - 2 cups
 • Garam masala powder - ½ teaspoon
 • Cashew nuts - 15
 • Onions - 4
 • Poppy seeds - 1 tablespoon
 • Oil (for deep-frying) - as required
 
METHOD - 
1. Cut ladies finger into 1 ½ inch length pieces. 
2. Deep fry in hot oil till light brown. (Do not over fry since it may become crisp). 
3. Dice onions and tomatoes into 1 inch pieces. 
4. Slit green chillies vertically. 
5. Dry roast poppy and cashew nuts separately. 
6. Fry onions till transparent in little oil. 
7. Grind these onions with roasted Ingredients: to smooth paste. 
8. Heat oil in fry in pan, tamper aniseeds or cumin seeds with little fenugreek seeds. 
9. Put slit chillies and ground masala. 
10. Stir constantly in medium flame till golden brown in colour. 
11. Add sugar, salt, chilly powder, dhania, jeera powder and continue frying till oil separates. 
12. To this mix strained and whipped curds and continue frying till oil floats on top. 
13. Add cut tomatoes and ladies finger. 
14. Allow it to boil for a few minutes. 
15. Serve hot.
